activityParameters.content: Indeed, Francesco. Your ambition is well-placed. Direct control over our Venetian ventures is the surest path to prosperity. Let us indeed discuss how our combined efforts might secure more prime parcels and expand our influence. I am always open to fruitful partnerships.

reflection: Francesco's eagerness to collaborate on land deals aligns perfectly with my strategic goal of expanding property holdings and influence. By fostering this alliance with an ambitious Artisti, I can leverage shared interests to secure more prime parcels and potentially open new avenues for my trade network, reducing reliance on traditional patrician structures and strengthening my position among the Forestieri and Cittadini.
